definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Next up is the bulging pencil case.
sentences.chinese: 下一步就是鼓鼓囊囊的铅笔盒。

sentences.english: Ss: All right. T: Open the pencil-box, please.
sentences.chinese: 学生跟读数遍，边读边做打开铅笔盒的动作。

sentences.english: This pencil-box is for you. That one is for him. Do you like them?
sentences.chinese: 这个铅笔盒给你，那个给他。你们喜欢吗？

sentences.english: Put the pencil case in my bag.
sentences.chinese: 把铅笔盒放进我的书包。

sentences.english: There is a pen, two rulers and three pencils in my pencil-box.
sentences.chinese: 我的铅笔盒里有一支钢笔，两把尺子和三支铅笔。

sentences.english: Then it crawls over your pencil case.
sentences.chinese: 然后它爬过你的铅笔盒。

sentences.english: I can't find my pencil case , it could be still at school.
sentences.chinese: 我不能找到我的铅笔盒，它可能还在学校中。
杰克的铅笔盒在双肩背包里吗？

sentences.english: Put your math book under your pencil-case.
sentences.chinese: 把你的数学书放在你的铅笔盒下面。

sentences.english: She took a pencil-box out of her bag.
sentences.chinese: 她从书包里拿出一个铅笔盒。

sentences.english: There is a rubber in the pencil-box.
I will buy a new pen'cil-box.
sentences.chinese: 我将去买一个新的铅笔盒。

sentences.english: Put the ruler in the pencil case.
There is a new pen in Jim's pencil-box.
sentences.chinese: 在吉姆的铅笔盒里有一支新钢笔。

definition: stationery/item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
